General.Name: N Citron Inc
General.Description: N Citron, Inc. engages in the manufacture and sale of semiconductor products that process digital audio signals. It offers digital audio amplifier chips for digital TV and AC direct LED drivers, as well as for healthcare sector. The company was founded in 2000 and is headquartered in Seongnam, South Korea.
General.Address: 35 Silicon Park A-dong, Seongnam, South Korea, 13486

3.Name: Mr. Jae-Hui  Won
